name: station-model-symbology
description: Dynamically generated, vector-based station model symbols for depicting weather observations on the client-side, for web maps. Compliant with [WMO-No. 306 "Manual on Codes", Volume I-1, Attachment IV](https://library.wmo.int/records/item/35713-manual-on-codes-volume-i-1-international-codes).
